title: Design direction
summary:
Following the brand values for SEB the Digital design direction is not just about aesthetics, it’s about clarity, function, and enhancing the user journey. In our complex world, we aim to simplify and remove obstacles for all our users. There for all aspects of design is part of the experience, such as writing and accessibility.  
  
So the user experience will be clear, seamless and engaging.

columns.text:
​We should always be on the user's side. We are the guardians, the safe keepers and the will for change in an ever changing world.
Knowing how we are perceived and experienced, we can motivate change within SEB and to our users.

To succeed, we need the guidance, empathy and the right tools. ​
This manifest is one of those tools. It’s a guide on how to make decisions, move forward and make changes that matter.

sections.title: Aim high, shoot long! And get lost in the woods

columns.text: With the backing of our design system, guidance and community we can focus on the parts that matter: Creating user experiences that are proactive and drive the bank forward.

We might shoot to high and miss the target, but we have gained momentum and new knowledge.
The path to the best solutions are seldom straight and the end goal will change, so stay agile and vigilant.
And if you get lost along the way, just embrace it! New insights trigger innovation!
